name: Сухой шампунь Shamtu для всех типов волос 150мл
ingredients: Butane - Propane - Alcohol denat. (7,6%) - Oryza Sativa Starch - Isobutane - Pentane - Parfum - Linalool - Aqua - Hexyl Cinnamal - Citronellol - Limonene - Cetrimonium Chloride - Benzyl Salicylate - Butylphenyl Methylpropional - Geraniol - Phenoxyethanol.
